newsitem.title: JORDAN: Jordan dinar overnight rate rises to 3.19 pct.
newsitem.headline: Jordan dinar overnight rate rises to 3.19 pct.

text.p: The weighted average overnight interbank rate on the Jordanian dinar rose to 3.19 percent on Sunday from 3.12 percent on Saturday, the Central Bank said.
The bank said seven banks traded on the market in 18 reported transactions with a total value of 15.2 million dinars ($21.5 million).
